actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to include surviving spouses without dependents within the definition of surviving spouse for purposes of determining the income tax imposed.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the requirement that married individuals who survive their spouses maintain a household for a dependent child in order to qualify as a surviving spouse for purposes of the income tax rates allowed for such individuals.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to include surviving spouses without dependents within the definition of surviving spouse for purposes of determining the income tax imposed.
